short_summary: BC/CM to improve prefabrication and off-site construction
description: The National Research Council Canada (NRC) is seeking to better understand the current state of prefab and off-site construction in Canada and set baseline for repeatable studies that can be undertaken every 2-3 years to capture trends and gaps in the sector.

full_summary:
### Tender Announcement

**Title**: TSPS Solutions - Stream 2: Business Consulting and Change Management

**Reference Number**: CB-551-749646

**Publication Date**: February 23, 2024

**Tender Closing Date**: March 13, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST

**Tender Category**: Service Procurement

**Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering

**Request for Proposal (RFP)**: The National Research Council Canada (NRC) invites bids for a business consulting and change management service to support the development of the prefab and off-site construction sector in Canada. The scope of work includes:

* Conducting a baseline study to understand the current state of the sector
* Identifying trends and gaps in the sector
* Developing recommendations for future studies and improvements

**Trade Agreements**: The awarded contract is subject to the Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, and other applicable trade agreements.

**Key Service Requirements**:

* Business consulting and change management expertise
* Ability to conduct a baseline study and identify trends and gaps in the sector
* Development of recommendations for future studies and improvements

**Tender Evaluation Criteria**:

* Technical merit (30%)
* Price (70%)

**Award Criteria**: The contract will be awarded to the bidder who achieves the highest combined rating for technical merit and price.

**Contract Period**: The expected contract start date is March 25, 2024, with an end date of September 30, 2024.

**Contact Information**:

* Philippe G. Cléroux, [philippe.cleroux@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca](mailto:philippe.cleroux@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca), 613-998-1073

**Attachment**: The tender document is available for download at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/32719/23-58127\_round-2\_npp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/32719/23-58127\_round-2\_npp.pdf) (English) and [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/32719/23-58127\_round-2\_apm.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada
